page_content:
1. **申请表格及声明书**：
   - [电表解/上锁申请表](https://www.cem-macau.com/uploads/Application_Form_for_Unsealing_or_sealing_of_Electricity_Meter_ver_Dec_2022_CE_7d5d93af31.pdf)
   - [暂停供应电力申请表 (不适用于终止合约)](https://www.cem-macau.com/uploads/Application_Form_for_Temporary_Suspension_of_Electricity_Supply_version_V11_aug_2020_a41774c3f4.pdf)
   - [电力装置用途/电业工程人员声明书](https://www.cem-macau.com/uploads/Purpose_of_Electrical_Installation_Electrical_Technician_Declaration_ZH_4ab9148e6d.pdf)
   - [电业工程人员申请表](https://www.cem-macau.com/uploads/ET_application_or_cancel_form_ver_Jun_2025_CE_download_ver_ad1a20a330.pdf)
   - [空气断路器测试申请表](https://www.cem-macau.com/uploads/ACB_test_request_form_version_25_Jan_2019_Customer_82ac0309d8.pdf)
   - [委托书](https://www.cem-macau.com/uploads/Authorization_Letter_ZH_787c13944f.pdf)
   - [“长者电费援助计划”声明书](https://www.cem-macau.com/uploads/Declaration_for_Senior_Citizen_Support_Program_ZH_4e55347a8b.pdf)

2. **隐私政策和Cookies使用政策**：
   - "本网站使用Cookies 以优化客户的浏览体验。若阁下继续浏览我们的网站，即表示同意使用Cookies及我们的[收集个人资料声明](https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/privacy-statement)。详情请阅读我们的[收集个人资料声明](https://www.cem-macau.com/zh/privacy-statement)。"

这些内容提供了有关申请表格、声明书的下载链接。

metadata.title: 申請表格及聲明書 | CEM - Companhia de Electricidade de Macau
